blacktea.title: Black Tea
blacktea.text: Dear @.^The adventurers'guild began to sell black tea!! ^It seems to be an aid to the battle.^You can come to me to buy it. ^^-Marlon
darktea.title: Dark Tea
darktea.text: Dear @.^There is a kind of dark tea in my hometown.^It seems to be helping to protect ourselves.^You can come to me to buy it. ^^-krobus
greentea.title: Green Tea
greentea.text: Dear @.^When I was cultivating green tea, I stumbled upon a better green tea. ^It seems to be helpful in all aspects of the human body.^You can buy it from my husband. ^^-Caroline
Oolongtea.title: Oolong Tea
Oolongtea.text: Dear @.^I recently found oolong tea outside of town.^It seems to help us explore the world.^You can buy it from my wife.^^-Demetrius
whitetea.title: White Tea
whitetea.text: Dear @.^There is a kind of white tea in my hometown.^It seems to make you more fortunate.^You can come to me to buy it.^^-Dwarf
yellowtea.title: Yellow Tea
yellowtea.text: Dear @.^It's shocking. I found yellow tea when I was fishing today.^It seems to be helpful in your fishing.^You can come to me to buy it.^^-Willy
